sentence: The war cry for justice was all over - Much to the chagrin of the authorities.
Maltese: Il-Cry Gwerra għall-Ġustizzja kien kollu - ħafna għall-Chagrin tal-awtoritajiet.
backtrans: The war for justice was all - many for the Chagrin of the authorities.

sentence: The regime's decision adumbrates the underlying agenda.
backtrans: The decision of the regime increased the underlying agenda.

sentence: The community was anxious over the passing of the much needed reforms.
Maltese: Il-komunità kienet anzjuża fuq il-mogħdija tar-riformi tant meħtieġa.
backtrans: The community was anxious on the path of reforms needed.

sentence: The think tank  published a paper outlining their apology of capital punishment.
Maltese: It-tank tal-ħsieb ippubblika dokument li jiddeskrivi l-apoloġija tal-piena kapitali.
backtrans: The think tank published a document describing the apology of capital punishment.

sentence: Aught was left of the petition's validity
backtrans: Aught was left from the validity of the petition

sentence: The President exhorted his ministers to buckle up as key opposition support for his economic plan was about to buckle.
Maltese: Il-President wera l-ministri tiegħu biex bokkla bħala appoġġ ewlieni għall-oppożizzjoni għall-pjan ekonomiku tiegħu kien waslu biex bokkla.
backtrans: The President showed his ministers to buckle as a key support for the opposition to his economic plan would have come to buckle.

sentence: The voters were chuffed to see the bill passed.
Maltese: Il-votanti kienu chuffed biex tara l-abbozz għadda.
backtrans: Voters were chuffed to see the draft passed.

sentence: The lawyer's discursive narration swayed the jury.
backtrans: The diskursive narration of the lawyer influenced the jury.

sentence: The EU block opposed an eventual imposition of anti-dumping measures.
Maltese: Il-blokka tal-UE oppona impożizzjoni eventwali ta 'miżuri anti-dumping.
backtrans: The EU block opposed possible imposition of anti-dumping measures.

sentence: A fulsome eulogy was delivered by the sly counsel.
Maltese: Eulogy Fulsome ġie kkunsinnat mill-avukat sly.
backtrans: Eulogy Fulsome has been delivered by Sly lawyer.

sentence: The gig-economy agency decided to garnish the refunds!
Maltese: L-Aġenzija tal-Gig-Economy iddeċidiet li tirranġa r-rifużjonijiet!
backtrans: The Gig-Economy Agency decided to arrange refunds!

sentence: Members of the anti-theocratic revolutionary movement overthrew the peers in power!
Maltese: Membri tal-moviment rivoluzzjonarju anti-teokratiku waqqa 'l-sħabhom fil-poter!
backtrans: Members of the revolutionary anti-theocratic movement overthrow their peers in power!

sentence: The traitors disappointingly decided to fight with the colonialists.
Maltese: Il-tradituri ddeċidew diżappuntati li jiġġieldu mal-kolonjalisti.
backtrans: The traitors decided disappointed to fight with colonialists.
